info.title: APIs to control service elasticity for system deployed in Cloud
info.description: Creates , amends and retrieves the service profile elasticity features including upscaling and downscaling of processing agents, enabling dynamic provisioning and cleaning up inactive pods

post.summary: Create cleanup instruction to initiate cleanup of downscaled servers
post.description: Create cleanup instruction for the particular server (pod) where services have been killed during downscaling phase

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: Contains the name of the server on which the service will run.  In cloud mode, it refers to pod or container

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The code related to override message

options.description: The usable options for the override

agentsRequired.description: Contains the number of agents required

elasticity.description: Defines the ability of the system parameters to upscale or downscale, depending on factors like time of the day, keys to process for a service, the stage of the COB etc

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

startTime.description: Contains the time job was started

deploymentMode.description: Indicates the deployment mode setting. For example CLOUD for cloud deployment, otherwise null

cleanupTime.description: Contains the time at which the pod is downscaled

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

runningAgent.description: The number of agents currently running

maximumAgent.description: Contains the maximum agents configured for the service

totalAgent.description: The total number of agents expected to be run

minimumAgent.description: Contains the minimum agents configured for the service

queueDepth.description: Number of entries waiting to be processed in the Queue

serviceId.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed

deploymentMode.description: Indicates the deployment mode setting. For example CLOUD for cloud deployment, otherwise null

queueJobs.description: Contains the setting for queue processing e.g ALL or particular job name. If set to ALL or a particular job name then the system will use the JMS queue processing otherwise system will use the standard job list processing feature

dynamicProvisioning.description: Contains the setting for elastic scaling e.g Yes or No.When set to Yes the dynamic upscaling and downscaling system feature is enabled

result.description: Status to determine requirements of the agents for scaling of services

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business
The identifier of error type: System

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

isBatchContainer.description: Indicates if the current server or container is batch instance

serverName.description: Contains the name of the server on which the service will run.  In cloud mode, it refers to pod or container

lastContactTime.description: Contains the last contact time of running agent

elasticDateTime.description: Contains the date and time for elastic profile of the service at which the upscaling and downscaling of the processing agents would take place. If blank then the default number of agents is used for the processing

elasticTotal.description: Contains total number of processing agents for elastic profile

elasticMinimum.description: Contains minimum number of agents for elastic profile

elasticJob.description: Contains the name of the job for which the elastic profile is enabled for upscaling and downscaling

elasticMaximum.description: Contains maximum number of processing agents for elastic profile

elasticQueueDepth.description: Contains the number of records for the elastic profile which controls the number of processing agents to be spawned or downscaled

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

code.description: The code related to override message

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override

cleanupTime.description: Contains the time at which the pod is downscaled

queueJobs.description: Contains the setting for queue processing e.g ALL or particular job name. If set to ALL or a particular job name then the system will use the JMS queue processing otherwise system will use the standard job list processing feature

dynamicProvisioning.description: Contains the setting for elastic scaling e.g Yes or No.When set to Yes the dynamic upscaling and downscaling system feature is enabled

agentsRequired.description: Contains the number of agents required
